Author: mmblarg
Text: Hahahaha oh god I’m sorry. I feel like that is a terrible catch 22 to be stuck in. Like yay emotional stress relieved, but wait, what is this emotional stress over here!?

Author: HoldenCaulfield7
Text: I’m in the boat where my scale has been broken for 3 months so I’ve been eating more lol. I think my mind is subconsciously telling me, “eat bitch!! Your scale is broken. Freedom!!!!!”   And now I’ve gained and my clothes are way tighter and I wish I had had my scale monitoring me. I really cannot win.
